Moonray5121 - (02/06/2009 13:41): Hello  
Moonray5121 - (02/06/2009 13:41): I have the following problem: I have seen the rollout menu under the [Edit] Menubutton. But now the Rollout does not appear anymore... Any ideas?  
tharindu\_ joined #xwiki at 13:49  
jvelociter - (02/06/2009 14:00): Moonray5121: Hi  
jvelociter - (02/06/2009 14:00): can you go on your user profile and make sure you have switched to the advanced edit mode ?  
Moonray5121 - (02/06/2009 14:05): Oh yes - thats what ist was.... thank you very much. Now i know what this is for ...

guillaum1 - (02/06/2009 18:00): sdumitriu: alas rendering with the LGPL engine gives less good results than JMathTex. So I propose to allow the admin to switch between both with help of a xwiki.cfg's property  
sdumitriu - (02/06/2009 18:00): K  
sdumitriu - (02/06/2009 18:00): Sounds good

Dieudonne - (02/06/2009 23:23): Anyone with experience in migrating a xwiki app from 1.1 to 1.8?  
sdumitriu - (02/06/2009 23:23): Did you encounter any problems?  
Dieudonne - (02/06/2009 23:24): A lot of!  
Dieudonne - (02/06/2009 23:25): Like Servlet.service() for servlet action threw exception  
Dieudonne - (02/06/2009 23:25): java.lang.NullPointerException  
Dieudonne - (02/06/2009 23:25):          at org.xwiki.container.DefaultRequestInitializerManager.initializeRequest(DefaultRequestInitializerManager.java:56)  
Dieudonne - (02/06/2009 23:25):          at org.xwiki.container.servlet.DefaultServletContainerInitializer.initializeRequest(DefaultServletContainerInitializer.java:72)  
Dieudonne - (02/06/2009 23:25): 50 like this one  
Dieudonne is now known as Theo-2 ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))
